item.title: Oil Tanker and Container Ship Collide in the North Sea
item.description: A container ship hit a stationary U.S.-flagged oil tanker on Monday, forcing the crews to abandon ship and raising fears about a leak of jet fuel.

item.title: Everyone Has a Plan for Gaza. None of Them Add Up.
item.description: Since President Trump suggested expelling the territory’s population, Middle East leaders have rushed to propose options for a postwar Gaza. Each is u...

item.title: Tesla Shares Plunge as Elon Musk’s Political Role Grows More Divisive
item.description: The automaker’s shares soared after Election Day as Elon Musk took a high-profile role as a Trump adviser. Now those gains have evaporated.

item.title: For a Family That Lost 5 Loved Ones, ‘Covid Will Never Be Over’
item.description: Elizabeth Fusco’s relatives had their usual family dinner in New Jersey in early 2020. Soon, her mother, three siblings and aunt were all dead.

item.title: Covid’s Long-Term Effects on the Lungs, Gut, Brain and More
item.description: Five years on, scientists are starting to understand how the virus can lead to long-term, sometimes invisible changes.
